CLUB_STADIUM_DESCRIPTION:
The club {club} is the resident club of the stadium {stadium}.
Discover the financial engineering behind this and what are the commitments from the public administrations involved.
STADIUM_CLUB_DESCRIPTION: The resident club of {stadium} is {club}. Discover what the taxpayers give to finance this club.
HOMEPAGE_DESCRIPTION: What taxpayers give to professional football?
HOMEPAGE_ADDR_DESCRIPTION: Discover how European taxes are spend for supporting footbal clubs and stadiums around you.
HOMEPAGE_CLUBS_DESCRIPTION: Discover the subsidies received from public institutions.
HOMEPAGE_STADIUMS_DESCRIPTION: Discover the financial engineering behind the stadiums and what are the commitments from the public administrations.
HOMEPAGE_FINDINGS_CONTENT:
Public money flows to professional football in Europe are running out of control.
Stadiums are being built that end up costing taxpayers millions. Cities engage in contracts that hide the true cost of an operation.
Subsidies are handed out without any oversight. Tickets are paid for with taxpayersâ€™ money and handed out by politicians to loyal supporters.
The spending spree is justified by the added value a professional football club brings to a city. However...
No audit has ever been made to estimate such value. Help us to assess and understand these costs.
ABOUT_CONTENT: Sykes aruzan keshiri klatooinian hoth. Tatooine organa monkey-lizard keshiri darth. Rebo vor xexto altyr calamari moddell lorth. Shawda gora kohl palpatine depa droopy falleen kowakian. Zam bothan letaki tapani ooryl drall draethos windu. Senex bardan choka mara var binks lobot lahara. Vebb tano baba nagai jacen md-5 organa. Mas mothma fode vuffi altyr snootles obi-wan chagrian. Coway mon nar nal falleen dexter bertroff quinlan. Jabiimas bespin timoliini iridonian owen dulok shmi rune. Yoda organa qui-gonn whill momaw kir mon ishi.

YEAR_MOST_SPENDING_OUTRO: In total, {territory} spent at least {total_amount_year} of public money to support professional football this year.

for the club {club}
LARGEST_BENEFICIARY_DESC: For the period {starting_year}-{ending_year}, we traced that {territory} provided {beneficiary} with {amount_largest_beneficiary} (for the club {club}), which makes it the largest beneficiary of {territory}.
SEE_MONEY_TRANSFERS_FOR_CLUB: See money transfers for this club
